ygData.subject: Re: Bracers of Erosilli
ygData.msgSnippet: The Bracers of Erosilli are found on the same island that Gornit the HG is on... you can see it from the boat when passing... There is a camp with a halfling
ygData.messageBody:
The Bracers of Erosilli are found on the same island that Gornit the HG is on... you can see it from the boat when passing... There is a camp with a halfling 'captain', dark elf, gnome magi, and wood elf around a fire and a couple tents right next to Gornit... the Halfling captain is the one that dropst he bracer... You might want a group just to be safe.. Gornit is pretty close to the camp, and every few minutes he will walk up towards the camp then back down into the water. So be alert...
Remember the bracers ARE lore+ACE-

Wes Lobdell,
Quote: +ACI-The certain proof that intelligent life exists elsewhere in the universe
is that no one has bothered to make contact with us.+ACI-

-----Original Message-----
From: Paul Fogle pfogle+AEA-amtele.com
To: 'EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com' EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com
Date: Monday, July 26, 1999 12:34 PM
Subject: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- Bracers of Erosilli


From: Paul Fogle pfogle+AEA-amtele.com

Can anyone tell me what I need to do to get one of these?
I went to the Sisters Isle.. got on a canoe and sailed around for a bit...
didn't find anything that looked like pirates, especially ones I could
solo.. I'm a 26th level rogue. Do I need a group for this?

Needun Luve, The Rathe
